events.title: Wedding Celebration
events.description: Celebrate your love in style with a grand wedding event. Our wedding package includes a beautiful venue, elegant decorations, gourmet catering, and a dedicated team to make your day truly special. Whether you're planning an intimate ceremony or a lavish affair, we'll ensure every detail is perfect. Create memories that will last a lifetime with our customizable wedding packages.

events.title: Birthday Party
events.description: Make your birthday a day to remember with a fun-filled party. Our birthday party package includes a colorful venue, themed decorations, delicious cake, and entertainment options like games and music. Whether you're turning 1 or 100, we'll create a memorable experience for you and your guests.

events.title: Anniversary Celebration
events.description: Celebrate your years of love and commitment with an anniversary party. Our anniversary package includes a romantic setting, candlelit dinner, live music, and personalized decorations. Whether it's your 10th or 50th anniversary, we'll help you cherish the moments that brought you together.

events.title: Engagement Party
events.description: Announce your engagement with a glamorous party. Our engagement package offers a chic venue, sparkling decor, champagne toasts, and delectable hors d'oeuvres. Share the joyous news with family and friends in an elegant and unforgettable setting.

events.title: Retirement Party
events.description: Bid farewell to your working days with a retirement party. Our retirement package includes a relaxed atmosphere, heartfelt speeches, and a retirement cake. Embrace the new chapter of life surrounded by colleagues and loved ones.

events.title: Baby Shower
events.description: Welcome the upcoming arrival of a bundle of joy with a baby shower. Our baby shower package offers a charming venue, baby-themed decorations, games, and a delightful menu. Celebrate the new addition to the family in style.

events.title: Holiday Party
events.description: Spread holiday cheer with a festive holiday party. Our holiday package includes a winter wonderland theme, seasonal decorations, a gourmet feast, and entertainment for all. Gather with friends and family to celebrate the magic of the season.

events.title: Prom Night
events.description: Dance the night away at your high school prom. Our prom package offers a glamorous venue, themed decor, a DJ spinning the latest hits, and a photo booth for capturing memories with friends. Make your prom night unforgettable.

events.title: Class Reunion
events.description: Reconnect with old friends at your class reunion. Our reunion package includes a nostalgic venue, yearbook-inspired decorations, a buffet of favorite school snacks, and a chance to reminisce about the good old days. Renew old friendships and create new memories.

events.title: Farewell Party
events.description: Bid farewell to a departing colleague or friend with a heartfelt farewell party. Our farewell package offers a warm setting, farewell speeches, and a memory-sharing session. Show your appreciation and send them off with best wishes.
